channel.title: Engine error
channel.description:
I got the error:
"Too many verts for a dynamic vertex buffer (33602 > 32768) tell a programmer to up VERTEX_BUFFER_SIZE."
So, I'm guessing the solution is clear :slight_smile:
Cheers!
Very good job on the game btw, it was very well worth the long wait.
